CollectionJojoBizarreAdventure.title: Jojo's Adventure
CollectionJojoBizarreAdventure.description: The story follows the adventure of Guts, a solitary warrior whose past is marked by dark and tragic events. Navigating a medieval world steeped in violence and magic...

chapter.title: Stand green and fire!
chapter.description: As they investigate a series of strange disappearances, Jotaro and his team uncover the existence of an ancient artifact...
